definition: to resign/to dismiss/to decline/to take leave/ballad (archaic poetic genre)/variant of 詞|词[ci2]

sentences.english: The inspector was able to put his finger on the weak point in the suspect's alibi.
sentences.chinese: 檢察官能準確指出嫌疑人辯辭中的弱點。

sentences.english: Preaching of self-contempt, eternalised in guilt. In words and deed, a man's high treason.
sentences.chinese: 這自卑的辯辭，不朽的罪悔，他那叛棄的言語和行跡。
